## Set Local

getwd()
setwd('C:/Users/paulo.brandao/Downloads/regressao-e-clustering-r')

## Install Libs
```{r install}
install.packages("readr")
library(readr)

install.packages("dplyr")
library(dplyr)

install.packages("ggplot2")
library(ggplot2)

install.packages("RColorBrewer")
library(RColorBrewer)
```

## Usando o data.frame

> Importamos os dados

```{r vendasonline, include=FALSE}
vendasonline <- readr::read_csv2('online_retail_II.csv')
```

> Vemos uma amostra das informaçoes disponíveis

```{r vendasonlineview}
head(vendasonline)
```

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(vendasonline$Quantity)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
